Key Match Events: Kiril Despodov's first half goal proved the difference in the end.
Post-Match Reflections: It was a night to forget for Northern Ireland in Plovdiv as they slipped to a 1-0 defeat at the hands of Bulgaria.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The visitors toiled on a terrible surface.
Others: Bailey Peacock-Farrell made an important early save but poor pass gave away the goal.
